entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Canada Bay area this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
